name: aml-svc
description: Complete backend API template using Hono + Chanfana + D1 + Vitest.

scripts.deploy:prod: wrangler deploy --config wrangler.prod.jsonc --outdir dist --upload-source-maps --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$(sentry-cli releases propose-version)
scripts.deploy:dev: wrangler deploy --config wrangler.jsonc --outdir dist --upload-source-maps --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$(sentry-cli releases propose-version)
scripts.predeploy:dev: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote --config wrangler.jsonc && REMOTE=true WRANGLER_CONFIG=wrangler.jsonc pnpm run populate && REMOTE=true WRANGLER_CONFIG=wrangler.jsonc pnpm run seed
scripts.dev: npm run seedLocalDb && pnpm run populate && pnpm run seed && wrangler dev
scripts.dev:local: npm run seedLocalDb && wrangler dev --config wrangler.local.jsonc --port 8789
scripts.predeploy: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote --config wrangler.jsonc && REMOTE=true WRANGLER_CONFIG=wrangler.jsonc pnpm run populate
scripts.predeploy:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote --config wrangler.prod.jsonc && REMOTE=true WRANGLER_CONFIG=wrangler.prod.jsonc pnpm run populate
scripts.predeploy:preview: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote --config wrangler.preview.jsonc && REMOTE=true WRANGLER_CONFIG=wrangler.preview.jsonc pnpm run populate && REMOTE=true WRANGLER_CONFIG=wrangler.preview.jsonc pnpm run seed
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: _SENTRY_RELEASE=$(sentry-cli releases propose-version) && sentry-cli releases new $_SENTRY_RELEASE && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --release=$_SENTRY_RELEASE --strip-prefix 'dist/..' dist
